hotels.name: MANDARIN ORIENTAL BANGKOK
hotels.description: Experience unparalleled luxury at the iconic Mandarin Oriental Bangkok, nestled along the Chao Phraya River. This legendary hotel combines traditional Thai elegance with world-class service, offering a serene sanctuary in the heart of Bangkok.

hotels.name: SIAM KEMPINSKI HOTEL BANGKOK
hotels.description: Siam Kempinski Hotel Bangkok is a luxury five-star hotel centrally located in the heart of Bangkok's premier shopping and entertainment district. With direct access to Siam Paragon shopping mall, this elegant property offers contemporary rooms, lush gardens, and multiple swimming pools creating a resort-like atmosphere in the city center.

hotels.name: THE PENINSULA BANGKOK
hotels.description: The Peninsula Bangkok is a stunning riverside hotel offering unparalleled elegance and luxury. This iconic property features spacious rooms with panoramic river views, exquisite dining options, a three-tiered swimming pool, and the legendary Peninsula service, providing a sophisticated retreat in the bustling Thai capital.

hotels.name: LEBUA AT STATE TOWER
hotels.description: Lebua at State Tower is a luxury all-suite hotel known for its stunning rooftop venues, including the famous Sky Bar featured in 'The Hangover Part II'. This elegant property offers spacious suites with balconies, multiple award-winning restaurants and bars, and breathtaking views of Bangkok and the Chao Phraya River.

hotels.name: TRISARA PHUKET
hotels.description: Trisara, meaning 'Third Garden in Heaven' in Sanskrit, is a tropical paradise nestled on a private bay on Phuket's northwestern coast. This exclusive resort features private pool villas and residences set amidst lush tropical gardens, offering breathtaking views of the Andaman Sea.

hotels.name: BANYAN TREE PHUKET
hotels.description: Banyan Tree Phuket is a sanctuary for the senses, offering luxurious all-pool villas nestled around a saltwater lagoon and surrounded by lush tropical gardens. This award-winning resort features world-class dining, a renowned spa, and an 18-hole golf course, providing an idyllic retreat in paradise.

hotels.name: AMANPURI PHUKET
hotels.description: Amanpuri, meaning 'place of peace' in Sanskrit, was the first Aman resort. Set on a secluded coconut grove overlooking the Andaman Sea, this timeless retreat offers pavilions and villas with private pools, exceptional dining experiences, and a holistic wellness center, embodying the essence of Thai luxury.

hotels.description: Conrad Koh Samui is a luxury pool villa resort perched on a hillside overlooking the stunning Gulf of Thailand. Each villa features a private infinity pool with panoramic ocean views, offering an exclusive and secluded retreat on the magical island of Koh Samui.

hotels.name: CLASSIC KAMEO AYUTTHAYA
hotels.description: Classic Kameo Ayutthaya offers comfortable accommodation in the historic city of Ayutthaya, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. This modern hotel provides a convenient base for exploring ancient temples and ruins, with well-appointed rooms and excellent facilities for both business and leisure travelers.
